long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
INTRODUCTION
Play Santa's Helper Game on your Google Chrome Browser with our simple & lightweight extension - No Internet required, no ADS, and 100% Free!

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Santa's Helper extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Santa's Helper icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Santa's Helper popup will open. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

You also can play more games from the top-left menu


HOW TO PLAY?
Press and hold anywhere to stretch out a stick, it has to be the exact length or Santa will fall down!
